transcript:

Executive: Hello.

Executive: Hello. Ji Piyush ji, Ilmabad se rahi hu India Mart head office se.
Customer: Sir aapka call aaya tha hamare paas.
Executive: Abhi baat karta hu.
Customer: Sir.
